title: There is a house in heaven built
author: R. C. Cottrell

verses.text:
There is a house in heaven built, The temple of the living God,
The tabernacle true, more pure, Is washed away by precious blood.

In love, one our High Priest entered there, Who knows the frailties of our frame;
Who loves to hear his people's prayer, And offer to our God the same.

The daily ministry he bore, Till sealed the prophetic hour;
He entered then the inner door, We trust the sacred place.

Before the ark of the command, On which the mercy-seat is placed,
Presenting his own blood he stands, Till Israel's sins are all erased.
